branchCategory.name: North American Specifications (NAL*00 Large Flow & NAL4*0 Micro Mist Lubricators)
branchCategory.description: <P>AL8/900 series large flow lubricators generate proportional oil delivery in 1-1/4”~2” lines. AL430/460 micro mist lubricators produce an oil fog that remains suspended in the air stream over longer piping distances. All types are available in North American, European metric, and standard metric configurations. </P>
